programme.title: Gakusanjin é derrotado pelos ascetas. Inuyasha e sua turma seguem as crianças e chegam a um templo na montanha a leste.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O compromisso do casal para o uso da Jóia (Parte 2)

programme.title: Hakudoshi está planejando tomar o lugar de Naraku. Ele rouba os fragmentos da Jóia Shikon de Kagome e seduz Kagura para trair Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Após curar suas feridas infligidas por Naraku, usando a alma de Midoriko, Kikyo encontra novamente Inuyasha e revela o segredo para destruir Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: É o dia do anual Exame de Promoção de Demônio Raposa. Miroku e seus amigos ficam presos nos testes. Shippo tira sarro de Inuyasha e sobe no ranking.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O ferreiro Toshu forjou uma lâmina de demônio usando uma das escamas de Ryujin, e a Dakki nasceu. Toda vez que Inuyasha tenta atacar, ele é prejudicado pela energia demoníaca.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga de Escamas de Dragão

programme.title: O Tetsusaiga atingiu o poder das escamas de dragão. A fim de poder usar rapidamente o poder demoníaco, Inuyasha não tem escolha a não ser passar por treinamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Koga chegam ao local da luta de Moryomaru e Naraku. Mas Moryomaru, que quer seus cacos de Shikon, pega Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo foi contaminado pela teia de aranha de Naraku. Para salvá-la, Inuyasha e Kagome precisam da corda do arco no mausoléu do Monte Azusa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kikyo tenta purificar Naraku e seus fragmentos de Shikon. Ela também tenta purificar a vontade de Midoriko que controla os cacos nas pernas de Koga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru pergunta a sua mãe como ele pode expandir o Meido de Tenseiga, o caminho para o submundo. Em resposta, sua mãe usa a pedra Meido que o pai de Sesshoumaru lhe deu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Príncipe das Flores é um demônio que se alimenta de corações tristes ou angustiados. Deslumbrado pela fragrância da flor, Inuyasha está envolvido em um sonho falso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O Espelho Demoníaco rouba a energia demoníaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demoníaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A fim de derrotar os demônios, Sango reveste Hiraikotsu com veneno. Para purificá-lo do veneno, o Mestre das Poções diz que ela deve derrotar o demônio dentro do jarro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR
programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Decisão de Mirok

programme.title: Shishinki, o Ogre da Morte, aparece diante de Sesshomaru, dizendo a ele que Inuyasha e o pai de Sesshoumaru roubaram seu Meido Zangetsuha em uma batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trás do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele irá superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego à espada, bem como seu ódio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrança de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demoníaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mãos de Naraku. Mas ela volta à vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Então, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que está bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome está preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admissão, então ela decide voltar para casa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a má vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas é apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.title: Jotaro volta à vida normal, mas esconde o que Joseph chama de "Stand". A caminho da escola, o mesmo Jotaro se machuca e conhece um aluno chamado Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o cérebro de Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin ataca um Stand sem saber quem é o seu usuário. Jotaro e seus aliados encontram um dos assassinos a mando de DIO no voo para o Egito.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vitória parece certa quando Avdol usa seus poderes contra o assassino Polnareff, que tem a mente controlada por DIO. Quem será o vencedor desta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro encontra um orangotango em um cargueiro que parece abandonado. Durante uma busca no barco, eles se deparam com algo misterioso.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro chega ao hotel em Singapura, mas Polnareff cai direto na armadilha de um usuário de Stand ao entrar no quarto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro começa a desconfiar que Kakyoin esteja possuído quando ele age de modo estranho e espanca brutalmente um ladrão em Singapura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff parte sozinho para vingar a irmã depois de ser atacado por um estranho Stand que só pode ser visto no reflexo de um espelho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 1

programme.title: Kakyoin tenta convencer Polnareff a fugir quando descobre que o aliado está enfrentando uma batalha perdida contra o Stand inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados atravessam um deserto em que o Sol nunca se põe e a temperatura aumenta a níveis insuportáveis.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin sonha com um parque de diversões onde se ouve o choro de um bebê. De volta ao mundo real, um bebê aparece como passageiro do avião em que está a equipe de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ninguém leva a preocupação de Kakyoin com o bebê a sério, mas a verdade logo vem à tona quando eles vão parar no mundo dos pesadelos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o pai de Avdol em uma ilha remota, mas o homem vive sozinho e não quer contato com ninguém. Polnareff descobre uma lâmpada estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand que surge da lâmpada atende ao terceiro desejo de Polnareff e ressuscita Avdol, mas o ex-defunto só quer saber de acabar com o autor do desejo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Um helicóptero aterrissa na frente de Jotaro e seu grupo no Egito, mas não parece trazer a ajuda que Joseph pediu.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 1

programme.title: Avdol cria um plano para se defender do Stand, mas o inimigo está atento. Iggy, que deveria ajudar o grupo, cai no sono bem no meio da luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Iggy, o louco, e N'Doul, o deus Geb – Parte 2

programme.title: Kakyoin e Avdol procuram tratamento médico enquanto os outros homens entram em um café e são recebidos por dois irmãos usuários de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Khnum do Ongo e o Thoth do Bongo

programme.title: Um jovem chamado Chaka tem uma mudança súbita de personalidade depois de encontrar uma espada misteriosa. Jotaro e seu grupo viajam para o Cairo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff percebe que a espada de Chaka é um Stand quando é atacado por seu barbeiro. O problema é que a espada está mais poderosa desde a última luta.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados chegam à cidade de Luxor, e Joseph leva um choque ao tocar uma estranha pedra com uma tomada elétrica.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Avdol ficam presos um ao outro por causa do Stand inimigo. Quando eles finalmente conseguem se separar, acabam prendendo os pés em um trilho de trem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff, numa versão criança, precisa enfrentar o usuário de Stand Alessi contando apenas com seu minúsculo Stand. Na hora H, ele recorre a uma solução impensável.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo finalmente chegam ao Cairo. Eles encontram um homem que diz saber onde fica a mansão de DIO, mas ele se recusa a dar esta informação de graça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: História de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o líder taoísta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nação.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança, (2012, Comic Books and Superheroes)
programme.desc: Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente.

programme.title: Clockstoppers: O Filme, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Zak Gibbs (Jesse Bradford, "Hackers") é um adolescente normal que consegue poderes extraordinários após encontrar um relógio misterioso que pode parar o tempo!

programme.title: O Fantasma, (1996, Adventure)
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: A Bruxa do Cabelo Branco do Reino Lunar, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: História de dois amantes, a bruxa de cabelos brancos e o líder taoísta Zhuo Yihang e seu amor que pode mudar o destino da nação.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Clube da Luta, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: Honra, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficarão do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos começarem.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Cinderfella, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jerry Lewis plays Cinderfella – a hard-working and honest lad mistreated by his wicked stepmother and his two boorish stepbrothers. But miracles do happen when his Fairy Godfather transforms the klutzy fella into an eligible, handsome bachelor.

programme.title: The Disorderly Orderly, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Poor Jerome Littlefield. He wants to be a doctor, but he's incredibly squeamish. So he settles for the job of an orderly at the Whitestone Sanitarium, a career move that’s guaranteed to keep the patients in stitches!

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of ten Academy Awards including Best Picture, this electrifying musical sets the ageless tragedy of 'Romeo and Juliet' in the slums of 1950s New York and stars Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno, and George Chakiris.

programme.title: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever, (1970, Comedy)
programme.desc: Daisy Gamble, a woman who hears phones before they ring wants to quit smoking, to please her fiancee, Warren. She goes to a doctor of hypnosis to do it. But once she's under, her doctor finds out that she can regress into past lives.

programme.title: The Bells Of St Mary's, (1945, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

programme.title: The Children's Hour: The Children's Hour, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: In this provocatively daring film, an attention-seeking schoolgirl vengefully spreads rumors that her teachers (Audrey Hepburn and Shirley MacLaine) are lesbians.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit, (1945, Comedy)
programme.desc: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

programme.title: Brief Encounter, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Expendables, (2010, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A tight-knit team of skilled combat vets turned mercenaries, set out to save the innocent and punish the guilty in this blistering action-packed thriller.

programme.title: The Expendables 2, (2012, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Barney and his mercenaries race to stop five tons of weapons-grade plutonium from falling into the wrong hands in this all-star, action-packed sequel.

programme.title: The Expendables 3, (2014, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars in this explosive thrill-ride. When The Expendables face an old rival, it's a clash of old-school versus high-tech in the most personal battle yet.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Assault On Va-33, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery (The Boondock Saints) stars as Army Veteran Jason Hill. While on a VA hospital visit, terrorists infiltrate the building and take hostages. Hill is now outnumbered and the last line of defense against the armed insurgents.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends are holed up in a remote cabin, where they discover a Book Of The Dead. They unwittingly summon demons living in the nearby woods, which possess the youngsters in succession until only one is left intact to fight for survival.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lake’s bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isn’t really dead.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this season’s happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Set's Alessi, Part 2
programme.desc: The power of Alessi's Stand "Set" has turned Polnareff back into a child, leaving him confused and alone. A passerby named Marena takes the boy into her home to help him, but they are followed by Alessi and his terrible powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 1
programme.desc: After a long journey, Jotaro and his friends finally reach Cairo. They begin asking about the location of DIO's palace and find one man who says he has information, but will only answer if the group can beat him in a game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Gambler, Part 2
programme.desc: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before beginning a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: While Gon is on his date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Just when their battle is about to begin, Killua hears his brother's voice in his head, telling him to run away.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku, and Bonolenov meet in Meteor City, the home of the Phantom Troupe. They have returned after getting the news that the Chimera Ant, Zazan, has built her nest in their city.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Dirty Pair
programme.desc: Join in on the adventures of Kei and Yui in The Dirty Pair.

programme.title: Dirty Pair
programme.desc: Join in on the adventures of Kei and Yui in The Dirty Pair.

programme.title: Dirty Pair
programme.desc: Join in on the adventures of Kei and Yui in The Dirty Pair.

programme.title: Dirty Pair
programme.desc: Join in on the adventures of Kei and Yui in The Dirty Pair.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1
programme.desc: Hol Horse arrives at Cairo in order to pursue Jotaro and the others. He has joined forces with another partner and is after the lives of Jotaro and crew once more. What's more, his new partner is none other than Mondatta.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
programme.desc: The baseball game with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts telling D'Arby what pitches he'll be throwing. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
programme.desc: After a long, hard journey, the group is suddenly faced with saying goodbye to a friend. Polnareff can't control his emotions and starts brandishing his sword toward an unseen enemy with very little success.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: The Art of War, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

programme.title: The Art of War II: Betrayal, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Neil Shaw returns in the no holds barred action adventure sequel. When Shaw is called out of retirement as a Hollywood film consultant by the murder of his long-time martial arts mentor, 'Mother.'

programme.title: The Art of War III: Retribution, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: When international diplomacy comes up short, extreme measures must be taken. In the newest installment of Art of War, Agent Neil Shaw is on a covert mission to stop North Korean terrorists from obtaining a nuclear bomb.

programme.title: Lila & Eve, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: Lila, a grief-stricken mother reeling from her son's murder, attends a support group where she meets Eve, who urges her to take matters into her own hands to track down her son's killers. They soon embark on a journey of revenge, but also recovery.

programme.title: Dark Tide, (2012, Action)
programme.desc:
Kate accepts a lucrative opportunity to lead a thrill-seeking millionaire businessman on a shark dive in the most dangerous waters, outside the cage.
PG-13

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk, (2003, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: For many years a mysterious monk with no name (Chow Yun-Fat) has zigzagged the globe to protect an ancient scroll -- a scroll that holds the key to unlimited power. Now the Monk must look for a new scrollkeeper.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: The Grandmaster, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: From director Wong Kar Wai and starring Tony Leung and Ziyi Yang, THE GRANDMASTER is an epic action film inspired by the life of Ip Man, the legendary kung fu master who trained Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Red Cliff, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Legendary action cinema master John Woo and international superstar Tony Leung reunite for the first time since the 1992 classic HARD BOILED with this epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the Han Dynasty's end.

programme.title: Reign Of Assassins, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Elusive assassin Drizzle transforms herself into modest shop owner Zeng Jing (Michelle Yeoh) in order to transport the remains of an exalted Buddhist monk to their eternal resting place, but finds her mission unexpectedly complicated.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master [Cantonese-Language Version], (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Legendary action director Yuen Woo Ping draws on a stellar cast (Michelle Yeoh, Dave Bautista, Tony Jaa, and Max Zhang) to create a hard-hitting martial arts blast worthy of its place in the celebrated IP MAN universe.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: An eccentric dad dresses as a British nanny so he can care for his kids at the home of their mother.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Jack and Jill, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) is successful and has the perfect family, but he dreads one event each year: the annual visit of his twin sister Jill (also Adam Sandler). Things spin out of control when Jill decides to extend her visit, permanently!

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Little Nicky, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest—and nicest—son, Little Nicky, to bring the other two home.

programme.title: Grown Ups, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny (Adam Sandler) finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, wild bus drivers, cops on skis and 400 costumed party crashers, sometimes crazy follows you.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Twilight, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small, isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret; could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.title: Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: Rent, (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Based on Jonathan Larson's Bohemian rock musical, Rent tells the story of a group of social outcasts struggling to live in the moment yet survive the realities of New York's gritty East Village.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: As the entire nation watches the presidential campaign hurtle towards Election Day, one soldier races to uncover the conspiracy behind it - a conspiracy that seeks to destroy democracy itself.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Alvin and Lance, his girlfriend’s brother, leave the city behind to spend the summer of 1988 repainting traffic lines on a desolate country highway, bickering and joking their way into an unlikely friendship.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A new technologically-superior Soviet nuclear sub is heading for the U.S. coast; however, one CIA analyst thinks the captain will defect the submarine, and he only has hours to prove it.

programme.title: Patriot Games, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan is caught in the middle of a terrorist attack. Ryan helps to thwart Holmes’ assailants and becomes a local hero. But Ryan’s act marks him as a target. Now he must return to action to save his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: When his mentor Admiral James Greer becomes ill, Ryan is appointed acting CIA Director of Intelligence.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Boogie Nights, (1997, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: In this dark, comic drama, a gullible teenager takes a turbulent journey through the worlds of pornography, disco and fleeting stardom in the '70s, when drugs were in vogue, fashion was in flux and the party never seemed to stop.

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Inspired by the true story about a single father and his young son. Finding themselves homeless, he risks everything on an unpaid internship in a highly competitive stockbroker training program, where only one in twenty interns make the grade.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Aftersun, (2022, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Years after their last vacation, Sophie reflects on the rare time spent with her loving, idealistic father and tries to reconcile the father she knew with the man she didn't.

programme.title: Chef, (2014, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Chef quits his job in LA after refusing to compromise with its owner, he is left to figure out what's next. He teams up with his ex, a friend & his son to launch a food truck reigniting his passion for the kitchen and zest for life.

programme.title: Forrest Gump, (1994, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks gives an astonishing performance as Forrest, an everyman whose simple innocence comes to embody a generation.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Sam Childers is a former drug-dealing, biker, tough guy who found God and becomes a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

programme.title: The Monuments Men, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: THE MONUMENTS MEN centers around an unlikely World War II platoon, tasked with going into Germany to rescue artistic masterpieces from Nazi thieves and returning them to their rightful owners.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Young Guns, (1988, Western)
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.

programme.title: Young Guns II, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: The West has changed since The Regulators last rode through. Cornered by the ruthless cattle kings and double-crossed by corrupt government officials, Billy the Kid leads the Regulators down a treacherous trail towards Old Mexico… and destiny.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: South of Heaven, West of Hell, (2001, Western)
programme.desc: A small-town marshal, tormented by the puzzling conditions that surround him, is forced to confront his demons at an unexpected and untraditional 'family reunion'.

programme.title: Savage State, (2021, Western)
programme.desc: When the American Civil War breaks out, a family of french settlers must abandon their Missouri home.

programme.title: The Conspirator, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Robert Redford comes the riveting true story behind the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln – including the lone woman who was accused of plotting his murder.

programme.title: Sanctified, (2022, Western)
programme.desc: A thrilling Western set in 1890 North Dakota, 'Sanctified' is the tale of an outlaw rescued from death by a nun traveling the Badlands. A deep friendship develops as she nurses the man back to health in exchange for his guidance at a local church.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Adventure)
programme.desc: Get ready for thrills in Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark. Indy and his ex-flame Marion Ravenwood dodge booby-traps, fight Nazis, and stare down snakes in their incredible worldwide quest for the mystical Ark of the Covenant.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom, (1984, Adventure)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, (2008, Adventure)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark, (1981, Adventure)

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy’s Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn't this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom's meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Break Through! The Straw Hat's Mighty Sea Battle!

programme.title: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom, but that's when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri's next move, but Katakuri's attacks keep pulling him down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!

programme.title: The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who'll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!

programme.title: Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Lurking in the Darkness! An Assassin Targeting Luffy!

programme.title: Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Man's Determination! Katakuri's Deadly Big Fight!

programme.title: Luffy leans on his training to bring out the power of his Haki! Meanwhile, the children of Big Mom gather as a massive force, ready to smash Luffy and the Straw Hats. Their resentment at being embarrassed fuels their desire to get revenge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top the Strongest!

programme.title: Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels! Their powers ensure that each blow could be the last! Luffy must rely on his training, let all his thoughts out, and keep pushing on! Meanwhile, Sanji is about to land at Cacao Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!

programme.title: Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close! But even if he is able to pull out victory in the last moment, can he remember the key to escaping the Mirrorworld?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, It's Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight against Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy emerges safely! And Pekoms' bravery ensures he and the Straw Hats have a fighting chance! But can they withstand the full force of the Big Mom Pirates? At the last moment - a surprise explodes onto the scene!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!

programme.title: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!

programme.title: Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!

programme.title: With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!

programme.title: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current!

programme.title: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!

programme.title: Luffy's recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats' next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The World is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!

programme.title: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don't fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy's exploits and remembers their shared past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!

programme.title: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard's affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!

programme.title: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!

programme.title: Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Stelly, Sabo's adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!

programme.title: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Life, (2017, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A team of scientists whose mission of discovery aboard the International Space Station turns into one of primal fear when they find a rapidly evolving life-form that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: District 9, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly find a kindred spirit in a government agent that is exposed to their biotechnology.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Zombies)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: He’s a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. He’s Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: In 2028, Los Angeles is in the midst of the most violent riot in its history. Four bank robbers botch a heist and head to the Hotel Artemis, a penthouse and an ER that exclusively serves criminals – all of whom now set their sights on the robbers.

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: In this thrilling follow-up to one of the greatest Western sagas in film history, notorious desperado Chris Adams (George Kennedy) is offered a huge reward to free a young Mexican revolutionary from prison…in the midst of the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Buffalo Girls, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: Based on Larry McMurtry's best-selling novel which celebrates the bold escapades of Calamity Jane and her illustrious cohorts, as they travel the wild west in search of her long-lost daughter and the west they once knew.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.title: Center Stage, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: The American Ballet Company is not for the fainthearted, it's for the most gifted and beautiful ballet dancers alive. But you'll need more than mere physical prowess and determination to succeed. PG-13

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.

programme.title: Center Stage, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: The American Ballet Company is not for the fainthearted, it's for the most gifted and beautiful ballet dancers alive. But you'll need more than mere physical prowess and determination to succeed. PG-13

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl, (2008, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.
